caption:
This photograph captures a tropical urban landscape from an elevated perspective. A large, multi-story building, possibly a hotel or condominium, dominates the foreground. Its architectural design is noticeable with its rounded, tiered balconies that provide a wrap-around view. The topmost part of the building is uniquely capped with a golden-yellow, circular structure, possibly a rooftop feature or water tank.

To the right of the building, a street lined with palm trees stretches alongside. This street is populated with a few moving vehicles and appears to run parallel to a beach visible in the distance. The azure sea complements a clear sky dotted with a few fluffy clouds.

The background includes another building, similar in height but different in design, indicating a densely built beachfront area. The natural and urban elements combine to provide a scenic view, suggesting a location that balances city life with beachside leisure.
title: "Round" hotel Waikiki Beach
